rationale.description: This feature came out in first place in the list of features which developers said they had difficulties using because of lack of support or differences between browsers in the State of CSS 2024 survey

Many JavaScript-based workarounds exist to position elements related to other elements. The oddbird/css-anchor-positioning polyfill is downloaded 15000 times a week on NPM, and its GitHub repository has more than 350 stars
In the State of CSS 2022 survey, `backdrop-filter` was a common response to the question about browser incompatibilities
The State of CSS 2023 survey shows a pattern of steadily growing use of the feature between 2020 and 2023
Render blocking is a prerequisite for cross-document view transitions, which is a highly requested feature

Animating to and from auto heights is a very common use case in CSS. This feature makes it possible to animate between a fixed length and any other type of length which can be expressed in CSS. The Interop 2025 feature proposal received 67 positive reactions on GitHub
In the State of CSS 2024 survey, container queries was the second-most common response to the browser incompatibilities question
In the State of CSS 2024 survey, container style queries was in the top 20 most common responses to the browser incompatibilities question
The Interop 2025 feature proposal received more than 120 positive reactions on GitHub

Over the past decade, single-page web applications have become very popular, and JavaScript frameworks have been used to provide the ability to smoothly transition between UI states without full page reloads. The View Transitions API allows multi-page apps to achieve the same level of smoothness and interactivity without JavaScript
View transitions is the 5th most requested feature in the browser incompatibilities question in the State of CSS 2024 survey
The CSS Custom Highlight API was the 5th content-related feature with the most positive sentiments in the State of HTML 2024 survey
Compelling use cases and positive reactions were received on the feature proposal on GitHub
Supportive comments were also received on the announcement css-tricks.com blog post
The GitHub issue about improving the `is` HTML attribute received a lot of attention and reactions
The Custom Elements polyfill is very popular, with more than 26000 weekly downloads on NPM, and 250 stars on GitHub
The Chromium implementation bug for `document.caretPositionFromPoint()` has more than 45 votes
The specification pull request for this feature received a lot of positive reactions
The Chromium implementation bug has more than 70 votes
The `field-sizing` property makes it possible to remove JavaScript-based workarounds for sizing form fields
The autosize NPM package, which automatically adjusts the height of textareas to fit their content, has more than 700,000 weekly downloads
The feature proposal issue on the Web Components specification GitHub repository received a lot of positive reactions
In the 2022 APIs and JavaScript MDN short survey, more than 15% of respondents agreed that the Intersection Observer API needed to be improved across browsers
The Interop 2025 feature proposal for JPEG XL received more than 600 positive reactions

name: JSON and CSS modules

rationale.description: The GitHub issue which initially introduced the JSON module scripts idea received a lot of positive reactions
The GitHub issue which initially introduced the CSS module scripts idea received more than 200 positive reactions

rationale.description: The Interop 2025 feature proposal received 25 positive reactions
Comments on the State of CSS 2023 survey indicate that developers want cross-browser support for this feature
This feature was in 7th place in an MDN short survey asking people to rank 20 web features
The Interop 2025 feature proposal received 96 positive reactions

name: Same-document view transitions
description: View transitions allow you to create animated visual transitions between different states of a document.

rationale.description: View transitions is the 5th most requested feature in the browser incompatibilities question in the State of CSS 2024 survey
CSS scoping appears in the top ten missing features in the State of CSS 2023 survey
This feature is in the top twenty features which developers said they had difficulties using because of lack of support or differences between browsers in the State of CSS 2024 survey
The Interop 2025 feature proposal received more than 50 positive reactions

name: Scroll anchoring
description: Scroll anchoring is a browser feature which automatically adjusts the scroll position to prevent visible jumps when content changes above the viewport. The `overflow-anchor` CSS property allows developers to opt-out of the scroll anchoring behavior for specific elements.

rationale.description: Many likes and retweets on the initial announcement of the scroll anchoring feature when it was implemented in Chrome
Developer interest in the tracking implementation bug in WebKit
In the State of CSS 2024 survey, styling scrollbar ranked eighth in the browser incompatibilities question
The scrollend feature is used by more than 20% of page loads in Chrome, according to chromestatus.com
In the 2021 Scroll Survey, 43% of respondents said that it was somewhat or extremely difficult to work with scrolling
Adoption on supporting browsers is growing rapidly
WordPress 6.8 uses speculation rules to improve performance

name: Top layer animations
description: A set of CSS features which makes top layer elements, like `<dialog>` elements, or elements with the `popover` attribute, animatable as they enter and exit the top layer. The features include the `overlay` CSS property, the `@starting-style` at-rule, the `transition-behavior` CSS property, and support for animating the `display` and `content-visibility` CSS properties.

rationale.description: Top layer animations allow animating popovers, which is a highly requested feature

wpt: /results/?q=feature:overlay or feature:starting-style or feature:display-animation or feature:transition-behavior

rationale.description: Interest from the community and adoption on supporting browsers is high

Feedback received while testing the API with developers has been positive
The Interop 2025 feature proposal for WebDriver BiDi received more than 70 positive reactions
The specification GitHub repository has 900 stars
